name: Sherloq
headline: One place for all your queries, directly on your SQL editor
description:
Companies use Sherloq as their single source of truth for their SQL on top of their existing data stack.

Today, data-driven organizations face the challenge of giving 2 of their data analysts the same task and getting 2 totally different results from their analysis. Although SQL is the #1 coding language for data analysis, it is still managed independently on each user's internal documentation tools (notepads, Slack channels, or docx files).
Creating one source of truth is an ongoing difficult process, that’s done manually and takes time to implement. 

Using our plugin on top of our user's existing query editors, companies can now manage their SQL code in one place.
We ourselves are data users and we've built Sherloq to fit the exact needs of data teams, becoming a true alternative to the way SQL is being managed today.

### Save from Editor
### Save from Editor
And when we say save we mean: save, share, view, search, edit - you name it.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/xJhju1wq4HUXrK5qsSdslF2ZMI.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/xJhju1wq4HUXrK5qsSdslF2ZMI.png)
### Snippets
### Snippets
Insert your queries directly into your IDE for templates and reusable pieces of code. 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/hFOPkjGSNX5X6D5TkQGZ5uvkSSg.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/hFOPkjGSNX5X6D5TkQGZ5uvkSSg.png)
### History
### History
Go back to any query you or someone from your team has run, even if it wan't saved

![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/4eVRVHK1C7yVDOWwly7eLBaUrRY.png)

## Share your queries in one click
## Share your queries in one click
No more waiting for someone to send you over their SQL
### Permissions
Manage who can view and edit each folder and SQL. Easily create and share with specific people or teams.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QIR8SqMyUkYmzZZsAlFvAWYUc.png)
### Version Control
Create versions of your queries without going through the long processes of regular code.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QIR8SqMyUkYmzZZsAlFvAWYUc.png)
### Activities
Be sure to use the most relevant SQL by seeing how many teammates viewed, shared and edited it.
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/QIR8SqMyUkYmzZZsAlFvAWYUc.png)
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/eSodLpWF9NpmyaPLSUPFmQ4aozQ.png)

## Data security is our top priority
## Data security is our top priority
We're SOC2 compliant, and don't have any integrations into your data or metadata, read more [here](http://sherloqdata.io/<https:/docs.sherloqdata.io/security>). We maintain strict infrastructure security with SSO support and on-prem solutions for Enterprise plans. 
![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/ywD6zZSp2ZvFnU9hJDV1H4OO3VA.png)
## Up and running in less than minutes
## Up and running in less than minutes
Download the Chrome extension or Intellij plugin to get started
Download the Chrome extension or Intellij plugin to get started
[![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/el04SmkrhlAD8Lh9oLNbZ1bm0.svg)Download extension](http://sherloqdata.io/<https:/chromewebstore.google.com/detail/sherloq-save-share-simpli/kjndilccgkemibeimjdefmjkhfddobfk>)[![](https://framerusercontent.com/images/DDuIhFABCIXAIlmEWLgDWNvNIk.svg)Download Intellij plugin](http://sherloqdata.io/<https:/plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/22201-sherloq--save-share--simplify-your-queries>)
Being a data person is hard enough, so to all you data people out there:
## Keep on rocking! Your JOINs make the world go round.
## Don’t let tough queries get you down; you’re the master of SELECTing success!
## You’re doing a fantastic job! Remember, even the toughest WHERE clause has an answer.
## You’ve got this! Just like SQL, you know how to handle complex challenges with ease.
## Keep at it—every time you optimize a query, you make data dreams come true!
## You’re not just sorting data; you’re sorting through puzzles and finding hidden gems. Great work!
## Every NULL you handle is one step closer to data perfection. Keep up the amazing work!
## Your skills are unmatched—just like your ability to find the perfect keys for every table.
## Keep doing what you do best; the way you transform data is nothing short of magic.
## You’re a data wizard! Don’t let anyone tell you otherwise. You make sense of chaos every day
## You bring structure to data chaos—keep shining, data hero!
## You're a master at crafting queries; each line you write brings clarity to data!
## Don’t forget: every complex query you conquer is one more reason you’re awesome!
## Keep pushing through those nested queries; you’re building something incredible!
## Just like indexes speed up queries, your hard work speeds up progress. Keep going!
## When others see data, you see possibilities. Keep being amazing!
## You handle SQL syntax like a pro—no JOIN too complex for you!
## Keep rocking those queries, data detective! You’re turning bytes into brilliance.
## You’re creating connections, one JOIN at a time. Keep up the fantastic work!
## Remember, every query you write brings insights that make a difference. Keep being awesome!

generated_description:
### Sherloq: The Future of SQL Query Management

**Company Overview**  
Founded in 2022 and situated in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel, Sherloq is an innovative startup that's a part of Y Combinator's Batch W23. With a small, agile team of six, Sherloq tackles a big issue faced by data-driven organizations: the inconsistency and fragmentation in SQL code management among data analysts.

**Mission**  
Sherloq’s mission is straightforward yet powerful: to provide a single source of truth for all SQL queries directly within users' SQL editors. This eliminates the chaotic reliance on various tools such as notepads, Slack channels, or Word documents.

**The Problem They Solve**  
In many companies, two data analysts tasked with the same question often end up with wildly different results—a symptom of the way SQL is typically managed. Sherloq addresses this by simplifying and centralizing SQL management, allowing teams to share, edit, and document queries seamlessly.

**How It Works**  
Sherloq functions as a plugin that integrates directly into existing query editors, bridging the gap between analysts and their queries without requiring them to change their workflow. Features include query saving, sharing capabilities, version control, and an extensive history of previous queries—making SQL interactions smoother and more efficient.

**Tooling and Resources**  
The company doesn't just stop at query management. They offer various FREE tools for data professionals, such as:
- **AI SQL Syntax Validator**: Ensures correctness in SQL queries.
- **AI SQL Organizer**: Helps organize and manage SQL snippets.
- **SQL Visual Tool (ERD)**: Provides visual representations of databases.
- **SQL Formatting**: Enhances query readability.
- **SQL Greeting Generator**: Adds a personalized touch to queries.

And there’s a Chrome extension and an IntelliJ plugin to get users up and running in no time.

**Why Choose Sherloq?**  
Current solutions like GitHub or Confluence can be overkill for SQL management, while simpler options like Notepad don't cut it either. Sherloq's user-centric design helps professionals streamline their day-to-day operations, saving time and reducing errors. Plus, it keeps security and compliance top-of-mind, being SOC2 compliant and ensuring data integrity.

**Customer Feedback**  
Users have been raving about Sherloq’s practicality. Not only does it simplify the saving and sharing of queries, but it also reduces the time spent searching for important SQL code scattered across multiple platforms. Testimonials highlight the satisfaction of having a structured tool that logs queries and provides easy categorization and sharing.

**Looking Ahead**  
As a product designed by data users for data users, Sherloq shapes its development around the evolving needs of teams. The tool's rapid onboarding and intuitive design make it an attractive choice for organizations that prioritize effective data analysis while striving to maintain consistency.

In summary, Sherloq is more than just a plugin—it's a revolution in how companies manage, document, and collaborate on SQL queries, ultimately bringing clarity to something that often feels chaotic. Keep an eye on Sherloq as it continues to innovate and refine the landscape of SQL management. 

For more information, visit their website at [Sherloq](http://sherloqdata.io).
